string-array.name: array_tutorial_messages
string-array.item: Before you can capture evidence of work you will first need to add pupils to this device.\n\nTo do this press the \"Add a new pupil\" button on the Pupil Select screen, type in the pupils name and then press \"Save\" to return to the Pupil Select screen or \"Save and add another pupil\" to repeat the process.

In order to edit an existing pupil simply press the pencil icon next to that pupils name.\n\nFrom this screen you will be able to retype the pupils name and save it over the old details or delete the pupil all together by pressing the \"Delete\" button.

Now you have some pupils set up you can start capturing evidence.\n\nTo start this process press a pupil\'s name and you will be taken to the action screen where you will be able to attribute the work to additional pupils or start the capture process by pressing the corresponding button.

Once you are satisfied with your pupil selection press \"Take Photo\", you will then be presented with your devices camera, once you have taken your photo you will be given the chance to accept the photo or try again.

Once you are happy with the evidence you will be asked to grade it by selecting a ranking from 1 to 5 stars.\n\nYou can upload the evidence directly to your blog after selecting a grade or you can add a few notes before uploading that will be displayed below the evidence.
